pageProduct.name: Ponstan 250mg Capsules 20
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Ponstan capsules are effective in the symptomatic treatment of period pain.

Warnings

This preparation is for the relief of minor and temporary ailments and should be used strictly as directed.

Prolonged use without medical supervision could be harmful. Consult you doctor or pharmacist if pain or symptoms persist.

Always read the label.

Ingredients

Each tablet contains:

Mefenamic Acid 250 mg (Also contains lactose)

Directions

Take two capsules three times a day, with food from the onset of pain.
